text: That's probably the wrong fix: we just need to find what is the way to initiate a segmented colormap from a list in the latest matplotlib.
I am suggesting what I think is a better fix: https://github.com/KamalakerDadi/nilearn/pull/7

LGTM. Thanks

@alexsavio, do you want to check that it does fix #1294 ?
